Summary: It was a black disclike obect travelling below the clouds on a West North West route
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around February 16th 2006
divs: sighting details1. i was walking my friends dog up a steep hill 2.\3. i heard a lound propeller plane pass overhead and i stopped and looked up and noticed the small black object passing right to left on a west, north west flight path. i thought it was strange there was no sound and no contrail, and no visable wings. i thought maybe it was a plane very high in the sky and that was why i couldn't see the wings. but it passed below the cloud banks so i knew it was not a plane. 4. it flew absolutely straight. it looke like a square disk, like a square with bulging side and it was blsck with a grey spot in the center. 5. it passed into the tree line and i could no longer see it.
